alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Marshall; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 5:57PM CDT until June 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EASTERN DESOTO...WEST CENTRAL MARSHALL AND NORTHEASTERN TATE COUNTIES... At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Southaven, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Byhalia, Independence, Lewisburg, Red Banks, Coal Oil Corner, Wakefield, Cockrum, Frees Corners, Watson, Cedarview, Bright, Nesbit, Jago, Alden, Lurline and Fairhaven. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
